name: Hearings; electronic participation
text: [§571-94]  Hearings; electronic participation.  Upon reasonable advance notice to the court and the other parent and for good cause shown, the court may expedite custody hearings involving deploying parents and may allow an already-deployed parent to participate in a custody hearing by electronic means, including telephone, video conference, and any other means available to and deemed reliable by the court. [L 2010, c 177, pt of §2]
